rules_text: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. If there are seven or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard, you may cast a copy of Shingaku's back side without paying its mana cost.
rules_text2: Exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. Copy it. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. Exile Shingaku's Exertion.
flavor_text2: [i]Shingaku represents new experiences, and believes in cherishing every moment.[/i]
